title: Fridge surprise
ingredients:
500g minced steak

1 brown onion diced
1tbspn olive oil
pkt spring vegetable soup mix
1 carrot diced
1 small beetroot diced
1/2 green capsicum diced
1 zucchini cubed
handful of green beans sliced
2 big tspn curry powder (or even more)
Deb potato to thicken
Boiled rice to serve
method: Lightly fry the onion in olive oil with the curry powder, then add minced steak, breaking it up as it cooks.
Add diced carrot and beetroot and about half a cup of water and the packet of soup mix.
Cover and simmer for about 15 minutes.
Add capsicum, zucchini, beans and continue cooking for about five minutes.
Thicken the mix by adding a good half cup of Deb instant potato (or by using a cornflour paste).
testimonials: Himself went back for second helpings, so it must have tasted OK!
